item.title: Swift
item.description: Apple has just introduced a new programming language for iOS and OS X development, Swift. Here are my first thoughts about this new language.

item.title: Working with Legacy Code
item.description: Working with legacy code may be a daunting task. Michael Feathers in his 'Working Effectively with Legacy Code' gives a precise definition for it: '[...]legacy code is simply code without tests'. His book is a must read for every software engineer or aspiring one.
